This is a great set. I don'

column3: t understand why Lego made it so the X-wing is mounted at an angle. I think it should be level. I figured out how to make it so. One of the pieces&nbsp
column5: s TIE fighter is a trans-clear brick, round 1 x 1 open stud (shaped like a cylinder). The X-wing can be mounted level with the piece, so I ordered a few from Brick Link.

column1: There are no stickers, which is great (but rare) for a Lego set. Since this is a display/art set

column6: - Darth Vader). Overall, I rate this 4/5.

- TIE fighters very blocky. Look also out of scale a bit to the X-Wing (but I believe they did this on purpose to push a forced perspective).
